import ajax from'./ajax';import jsonp from'jsonp';//登录 注意：加token会拦截
export var reqLogin=function reqLogin(data){return ajax('/api/login',data,null);};//天气
export var reqWeather=function reqWeather(cityCode){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var url="https://restapi.amap.com/v3/weather/weatherInfo?city=".concat(cityCode,"&key=5b7a9d03558f93310350bc0849f3488f");jsonp(url,{},function(error,data){if(!error&&data.status==="1"&&data.lives.length>0){var _data$lives$=data.lives[0],weather=_data$lives$.weather,reporttime=_data$lives$.reporttime;resolve({weather:weather,reporttime:reporttime});}else{console.log("获取天气信息失败");}});});};// 用户列表
export var reqUserList=function reqUserList(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemUser',data,'GET');};//添加用户
export var reqUserAdd=function reqUserAdd(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemUser',data,'POST');};//删除用户
export var reqUserDelete=function reqUserDelete(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemUser',data,'DELETE');};//编辑用户
export var reqUserEdit=function reqUserEdit(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemUser',data,'PUT');};//编辑用户状态
export var reqUserStatusEdit=function reqUserStatusEdit(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/user/updateStatus',data,'PUT');};//查询用户信息
export var reqUserGet=function reqUserGet(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/user/getUser/'+data,null,'GET');};//--------------------------角色模块--------------------------------------------
// 角色列表(添加用户时使用)
export var reqRoleList=function reqRoleList(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemRole',data,'GET');};//树
export var reqRoleTree=function reqRoleTree(){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemRole/getTree',null,'GET');};//添加
export var reqRoleAdd=function reqRoleAdd(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemRole',data,'POST');};//--------------------------菜单模块--------------------------------------------
// 菜单列表
export var reqMenuList=function reqMenuList(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemMenu',data,'GET');};// 菜单树
export var reqMenuTree=function reqMenuTree(){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemMenu/getTree',null,'GET');};//添加
export var reqMenuAdd=function reqMenuAdd(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemMenu',data,'POST');};//删除
export var reqMenuDelete=function reqMenuDelete(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemMenu',data,'DELETE');};//编辑
export var reqMenuEdit=function reqMenuEdit(data){return ajax('/api/rbac/systemMenu',data,'PUT');};
